text: We are at the beginning of a new computing era. AI is the defining technology of our time, and accelerated computing is the foundation that makes it possible.
Moore's Law is dead in the traditional sense. But accelerated computing is the new Moore's Law. We're getting 100x performance improvements through software, algorithms, and specialized hardware.
The demand for our data center products is unprecedented. Every industry is racing to build AI infrastructure. This is a multi-trillion dollar opportunity.
The future of computing is accelerated. AI models will continue to scale, and the infrastructure to train and run them will need to scale with it.

AI is not just about software. It's about building intelligent machines that can understand and interact with the physical world. That requires massive compute.
